reference_documents: GI000198 > 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法_20231228 p.1
query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.title_name_en: Payment Instructions
results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
賬單號碼
請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
ATM (JETCO) 銀通櫃員機*
Our Merchant Code
9228
Bill Type
11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。

Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。

Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)

I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。

理財顧問或致電一般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
此為機密文件,及只作內部業務用途。請勿轉發。
請注意:整個銷售過程及所有申請程序必須在香港進行

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.title_name_en: Payment Instructions
results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)
Our Merchant Code
6555
商戶編號
6555
Bill Type
01 (General Insurance)
02 (Group Medical)
賬單類別
01(一般保險)
02(團體醫療)
Bill Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
賬單號碼
請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
ATM (JETCO) 銀通櫃員機*
Our Merchant Code
9228

11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別

9228
11 (一般保險保費)

繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保

用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.

財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

results.content_chunk:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.

results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL

Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年
Signature of Proposer / Policyowner
(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (A member of Prudential plc group)
保誠保險有限公司(英國保誠集團成員)

will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further

"For non-annual travel cover, since the cover under some sections is effective after the Certificate of Insurance is issued, the

results.content_en:
vival of the policy by the Company, may render the Endorsement and / or the contract voidable; (4) I / we shall disclose to the
Company any change in my / our health or insurability (for Policyowner, it is only applicable if payor benefit is applied) after signing the proposal until I / we

00000000
LAPA/PAIUWH (09/23)
12/16
PAIUWH1512Part 5 第五部分 Declaration and Authorization (Continued)聲明及授權(績)
本人/吾等,受保人/保單持有人,授權以下各項(1)任何醫生、醫院、診所、保險公司、僱主、機構或人士,將已經或其後存錄的有關
本人/吾等之醫療病歷、紀錄或其他資料披露予保誠保險有限公司,作為評估及處理此保單更改或復效申請及索償及提供其後服務之用。
為免任何疑問,本授權書對本人/吾等之繼承人、承讓人、遺囑執行人及遺產管理人均具有約束力。即使本人/吾等死亡或無行為能力
(包括但不限於精神上無行為能力),本授權書仍具效力。本授權書之副本將被視為與正本具同樣效力;(2)貴公司或任何由貴公司指定
之醫生、醫務人員或化驗所,可就此保單更改或復效申請或任何有關索償申請替本人/吾等進行所有所需之醫療評估及測試,以審核本人
/吾等之健康狀況。
只適用於「自願醫保」計劃
本人/吾等,作為受保人/保單持有人,在此聲明並同意:(1)保誠保險有限公司(「貴公司」)並未正式接納保單更改或復效,且於有
關批註 (「批註」)發出予本人/吾等前,任何保單更改或復效將不會生效;(2)此問卷收集與健康相關的資料僅作為核保之用途,而核
保是貴公司評估申請人之健康風險及決定申請結果的程序。貴公司採用的核保程序應為公平合理,並會因應本人/吾等要求解釋批註申請
結果;(3)作為申請人,本人/吾等需要盡其所知所信,按本問卷中要求向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料。貴公司根據本人/吾等提供的資

司;(5)即使已成功獲簽發批註,若本人/吾等未按(3)所述盡其所知所信向貴公司提供完整及準確的資料,或未按(4)所述就資料的任何
改變或更新而及早通知貴公司,本人/吾等的保險保障可能會受到影響,貴公司亦可能因此終止、作廢或撤銷有關批註及/或保單,或拒

料完全屬實,並將會是合約的依據;(3)假如本人/吾等未披露之事實或資料內容,足以影響貴公司衡量及應否接受保單更改或復效的申
請,可令批註及/或合約失效;(4)在本人/吾等簽署本申請書後直至本人/吾等收到批註前,本人/吾等必須向貴公司披露有關受保人及

司披露該事實或資料。
Part 6 第六部分 Collection of Levy by the Insurance Authority ("IA")保險業監管局(「保監局」)收取的徵費
From 1 January 2018 onwards, a levy on insurance premiums for insurance policies will be payable to IA by policyowner. IA will collect the levy from policyowner
through insurance companies. If you do not pay the overdue levy timely, the Insurance Authority ("IA") may, according to the law, impose on the policyholder a
penalty of up to HK$5,000, and may recover the outstanding levy as a civil debt due to the IA. Levy must be paid when the premium is paid.
In this connection, notwithstanding anything contained in this form, policy provision or any other agreements between us, you agree us with the following
assistance as may be necessary to enable us to collect any outstanding levy payable to IA in respect of the policy applied under this application form to the
extent applicable and relevant, subject to the terms hereof: -
(a) you authorize us to deduct the levy from Premium Deposit Account ("PDA") of the policy; and
(b) you authorize us to deduct the levy by Automatic Premium Loan ("APL") if any renewal premium of the policy is being paid by APL and such levy shall be part
of APL on which interest shall be charged in accordance with the policy provisions; and
(c) you agree the prepayment of levy on prepaid premiums if you pre-pay any premium; and
(d) in case the payment you pay to us is insufficient to pay for both premium and levy, you authorize us to settle the premium first; and
(e) in case the payment you pay to us is to settle outstanding levy, you authorize us to first settle the oldest outstanding levy.
由2018年1月1日起,保單持有人必須向保監局繳付保單之保費徵費。保監局將透過保險公司向保單持有人收取徵費。若 閣下未能依時
清繳過期徵費,保險業監管局(「保監局」)可根據法例向其施加最高港幣$5,000的罰款,亦可循民事程序追討欠付的徵費。徵費需於
繳交保費時同時繳交。
有見及此,儘管載於本表格、保單條款或我們之間其他任何協議所包含的任何內容,閣下同意我們在需要時提供以下協助,使我們能夠
就閣下透過此人壽保險申請書申請之保單適當地及相關地根據以下條款,收取任何應向保監局繳付之未繳徵費:
(a) 閣下授權我們從保單保費儲蓄戶口扣除所需的徵費;及
(b) 閣下授權我們可於保單之任何續期保費以自動保費貸款形式扣除時,同時以自動保費貸款形式扣除徵費,該扣除之徵費將成為自動
保費貸款的一部份並將按保單條款計算利息;及
(c)
閣下同意如預繳任何保費,將同時就預繳保費預付徵費;及
(d)
如閣下所繳付的金額不足以扣除保費及徵費,閣下同意我們先扣除保費;及
(e)
如閣下所繳付的金額是用作繳付逾期徵費,閣下授權我們先扣除最前期的逾期徵費。

保費貸款的一部份並將按保單條款計算利息;及
(c)
閣下同意如預繳任何保費,將同時就預繳保費預付徵費;及
(d)
如閣下所繳付的金額不足以扣除保費及徵費,閣下同意我們先扣除保費;及
(e)
如閣下所繳付的金額是用作繳付逾期徵費,閣下授權我們先扣除最前期的逾期徵費。
00000000
LAPA/PAIUWH (09/23)
13/16
PAIUWH1513

runs.query: How to use the BOC cheque deposit machine to pay premium for my general insurance policy?

results.title_name_en: Payment Instructions
results.content_en:
Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited Payment Instructions 保誠財險有限公司繳費辦法
To protect your interest, you are recommended to make the premium payment directly to us by using the following payment instructions. Prudential may change the premium payment
arrangement available anytime without prior notice. For enquiry, please contact your Financial Consultant or General Insurance Customer Service Hotline at (852) 3656 8362 or visit our
corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk.
為保障 閣下的利益,我們建議 閣下使用下列辦法直接繳付保費。保誠可能隨時更改可提供保費繳款安排而毋須事先通知。如有任何查詢,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或致電一
般保險客戶服務熱線(852) 3656 8362,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
Autopay by Credit Card or Bank Account 以信用卡或銀行户口自動轉賬
Should you need to set up autopay or change autopay account, please contact your Financial
Consultant or visit our corporate website at www.prudential.com.hk (Customer Support &
Self Service > Download Centre > Product Brochures eForm - General Insurance > General
Insurance Administration Forms) for downloading PRUchoice Series Payment Details
Amendment Form. Only applicable to PRUchoice "Personal Accident" / "Personal Accident
Plus" / "Medical" / "MediExtra".
Internet Banking 網上銀行 *
Your premium may be settled through internet banking bill payment services offered by
banks. Please contact your bank / Financial Consultant or visit our corporate website at
www.prudential.com.hk for further details.
FPS (if applicable) 使用「轉數快」繳款(如適用)
Procedures for making payments via FPS:
使用「轉數快」繳款的步驟:
a. Enable the QR code scanner of your mobile banking app or e-wallet.
a. 啟用銀行手機應用程式或電子錢包上的二維碼掃描器。
b. Check the daily payment limit pre-set with your bank or e-wallet and ensure that there are
sufficient funds.
c. Scan the FPS QR code printed on the bill.
d. Check and ensure that the payment details including merchant name, bill number and
payment amount are correct before confirming the payment instruction.
如需設立自動轉賬或更改自動轉賬戶口以繳付保費,請聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
於我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk(客戶及自助服務>下載中心 >產品小
冊子及表格–一般保險>一般保險行政表格)下載保誠精選系列一更改付款資料
申請表。只適用於保誠精選「安健寶」/「倍安寶」/「醫療寶」/「健康寶」。
閣下可選擇由銀行提供的「網上繳費服務」繳費。詳情請聯絡 閣下的銀行 /理
財顧問,或瀏覽我們的企業網站 www.prudential.com.hk。
b. 檢查預設的「轉數快」每日繳款限額及確保帳戶內有足夠的資金。
c. 掃描帳單上的「轉數快」二維碼繳款
d. 在確認付款前請小心核對繳交款項的資料,包括商户名稱、收款帳號和繳付
金。
PPS (Require a New Bill Registration by "Billing Number")繳費靈*(必須以「繳費編號」登記賬單)
PPS By Internet
Please visit www.ppshk.com
繳費靈網上服務
請瀏覽 www.ppshk.com
PPS By Phone
Please dial 18031 (English) or 18033 (Cantonese)
繳費靈電話服務
請致電 18031 (英語)或18033(粤語)

Number is 9)

請輸入 12 位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)

11 (General Insurance Premium)
12 (Employee Benefit Premium)
Bill / Account Number
Please enter 12-digit Billing Number (The first digit of Policy
Number is 9)
Payment Amount
Premium amount due in HKD
Cash in 7-Eleven (if applicable) 到 7-11 便利店以現金支付(如適用)
You can make your payment by presenting Debit Note at any 7-Eleven Conveniences stores in
Hong Kong. Please present the QR code printed on the Debit Note for payment in cash. Please
retain the receipt for payment record.
Cheque Payment by Mail 郵寄支票 *
Please settle the premium and return this Debit Note with a cheque to us at: 28/F, One Island
East, 18 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong.
Remarks: (1) Only accept HKD crossed cheque made payable to "Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write down the name of the Insured and the Policy
Number on the back of the cheque. (2) Only accept HKD cheque, cashier order or bank draft
which issued by Hong Kong banks. (3) Post-dated cheque is not accepted. (4) Please do not
send cash.
商戶編號
賬單類別
賬戶/客戶號碼
9228
11 (一般保險保費)
12(僱員福利保費)
請輸入12位數字繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)
繳付金額
以港元計算之保費總額
閣下可攜同付款通知書,前往香港任何一間 7-Eleven 便利店,出示付款通知書上
的QR 碼以現金繳付保費。請保留收據作付款紀錄。
請繳付保費連同付款通知書及支票一併以郵遞方式寄往本公司,地址:香港鯽魚
涌華蘭路18 號港島東中心28樓。
注意事項:(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票
背面寫上保單投保人及保單號碼。(2)只接受本港銀行發出之港元支票、銀行本
票或匯票。(3)期票恕不獲接受。(4)請勿投寄現金。
Bank of China (BOC) Cheque Deposit Machine 中國銀行(香港)有限公司(「中銀香港」)「存支票機」*
You may make your payment by depositing crossed cheques in HKD issued by Hong Kong
banks to the BOC Cheque Deposit Machine. Please be reminded (1) Only accept crossed
cheque made payable to "Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited". Please write
down the name of the Insured, the Policy Number and contact number on the back of the
cheque. (2) Pay one item per policy with one cheque only. (3) Key in your 12-digit Billing
Number (The first digit of Policy Number is 9) at the Cheque Deposit Machine. (4) If the
cheque payment is not accurate, complete or followed as set out by our company, you may
potentially suffer from loss due to delayed or overdue payment.
閣下可於中銀香港「存支票機」存入由本港銀行發出之港元劃線支票。請注意:
(1)只接受劃線支票,抬頭請寫上「保誠財險有限公司」,並在支票背面寫上保
單投保人姓名、保單編號及聯絡電話。(2)每張支票只限繳付一張保單的單項費
用。(3)請於「存支票機」輸入12位數字之繳費編號(保單首個數字為9)。(4)如
有關支票繳款未符合本公司規定,閣下可能因未能如期繳交費用而蒙受損失。
Note:
* Please allow 3 working days for payment processing. 請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)
results.content_tc:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^

自動轉賬戶口繳費。請

authorization, please send the form and the

processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).

A handling fee of HK$ 100 shall be charged for each cheque reissuance. 在未有就賠償指定銀行戶口時,將只會向保單持有人發出賠償支票。如有遺失賠償支票,保單持有人請以書面通知本公司。本公司將為每張補發支票收取HK$100行政費。 3. results.title_name_en: How To Read A Renewal Policy Checklist & Reminder Email
results.title_name_tc: 如何解讀續保保單清單及提示電郵
results.content_en:
如何解讀續保保單清單及提示電郵
1. 續保保單清單每月發出,電郵題目為“GIEB Renewal 1st Reminder & Expired Policy List"
發出日期:每月第二個工作天
(A)表:列出本月內將要到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
(B)表:列出上月份和本月份已到期並已發出續保通知書的保單
例子:如電郵發出日期為5/5/2014,(A)表將會列出由5/5/2014至31/5/2014 到期的保單,而(B)表將會列出由1/4/2014 至 4/5/2014
已到期的保單(請注意:保單清單只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品)
1
附有(*)的保單號碼將會於到期月最後一個工作天自動續保,惟有關保單以支票繳付保費,故此,提示電郵提醒您與客人聯絡,以
跟進支票付款事宜。
請注意:本續保保單清單只包括以支票付款的一般保險的產品
電郵樣本

test9@uatmail.prudential.com.hk

Subject:
GIEB Renewal 1st Reminder & Expired Policy List
(A)
(B)
Dear XXXX.
Please be informed that the following policies are going to be expired soon. According to our record, they are not renewed yet. To ensure the continuity of protection, please help your client to renew the policies as soon as possible.

Branch
4

SEVEN

Remark (*): Policy is to be auto-renewed upon policy expiry. Please settle the outstanding premium by cheque and coverage validity shall be subject to successful premium collection.
If you have already notified us to confirm the renewal, please ignore this email. Thanks for your attention.
Policy Administration - Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited
25/05/2014
Please do not reply to this e-mail. Mail sent to this address cannot be answered.
